# api-auth-better-auth-drizzle-hono

Better Auth patterns, sessions, OAuth

## Tags

`better-auth` `sessions` `oauth` `authentication` `authorization`

## Installation

Add this plugin to your Claude Code configuration:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["api-auth-better-auth-drizzle-hono"]
}
```

## Usage

This skill is automatically available when installed.

**Requires:** api-database-drizzle
